title: Project-Based Training on the Two-Eyed Seeing Approach to Enhance Indigenous Educational Participation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in operating foundational language education programs
context.additional_context: Corporate multicultural education officers or language instructors performing instructor roles

learning_goals: Design and present one lesson plan that integrates Indigenous cultural elements and language education using the Two-Eyed Seeing (TES) approach.
Develop three TES-based language learning activities using smartphones and propose improvements reflecting learner feedback.
Apply two collaborative learning strategies to efficiently manage large learner groups in a PBL environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
